UnitDefinition.Name: Population characteristic distribution types.
UnitDefinition.Description: Distribution types used to described population characteristics.

Unit.Name: Normal
Unit.Description: Normal distribution parameterised by a mean and a coefficient of variation.

Unit.Name: LogNormal
Unit.Description: Lognormal distribution parameterised by a mean and a coefficient of variation.

Unit.Name: Uniform
Unit.Description: Uniform distribution specified by a mean/median and a coefficient of variation.
